name: Masq
body:
Masq is an app for android that can be used to communicate via encrypted SMS messages.

[Click here to view the usage guide.](https://github.com/rcythr/Masq/wiki/Usage-Guide)

[Click here to view the FAQ](https://github.com/rcythr/Masq/wiki/FAQ)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
